tool.name: Export to GraPhlAn
tool.command:
python \${EXPORT2GRAPHLAN_DIR}/export2graphlan.py -i $input_file
-t $tree -a $annotation
#if $annotations --annotations $annotations #end if
#if $external_annotations --external_annotations $external_annotations #end if
#if $background_levels --background_levels $background_levels #end if
#if $background_clades --background_clades "$background_clades" #end if
#if $background_colors --background_colors "$background_colors" #end if
#if $title --title "title" #end if
--title_font_size $title_font_size --def_clade_size $def_clade_size --min_clade_size $min_clade_size --max_clade_size $max_clade_size --def_font_size $def_font_size --min_font_size $min_font_size --max_font_size $max_font_size --annotation_legend_font_size $annotation_legend_font_size --abundance_threshold $abundance_threshold

param.name: annotations
param.label: List which levels should be annotated in the tree (Optional)
param.help: The levels must be in comma-separated form (--annotations)

param.name: external_annotations
param.label: List which levels should use the external legend for the annotation (Optional)
param.help: The levels must be in comma-separated form (--external_annotations)

param.name: background_levels
param.label: List which levels should be highlight with a shaded background (Optional)
param.help: The levels must be in comma-separated form (--background_levels)

param.name: background_clades
param.label: List of the clades that should be highlight with a shaded background (Optional)
param.help: The clades must be in comma-separated form (--background_clades)

param.name: background_colors
param.label: List of color to use for the shaded background (Optional)
param.help: Colors can be either in RGB or HSV (using a semi-colon to separate values, surrounded with ()). The different colors must be in comma-separated form (--background_colors)

param.name: def_clade_size
param.label: Default size for clades that are not found as biomarkers

param.name: min_clade_size
param.label: Minimum value of clades that are biomarkers

param.name: max_clade_size
param.label: Maximum value of clades that are biomarkers

param.name: annotation_legend_font_size
param.label: Font size for the annotation legend

param.name: abundance_threshold
param.label: Minimun abundace value for a clade to be annotated

tool.help:
**What it does**
export2graphlan is a conversion software tool for producing both annotation and tree file for GraPhlAn. In particular, the annotation file tries to highlight specific sub-trees deriving automatically from input file what nodes are important. For more information, check the `user manual <https://bitbucket.org/CibioCM/export2graphlan/overview/>`_.
